attributes.action: Form a Government of National Unity to tackle the Covid 19 Emergency
attributes.background:
Covid 19 poses the gravest emergency the United Kingdom and its people have faced for generations. 
Confidence in a Government and its integrity is essential to maintain the trust of our population that the wisest choices are taken on everyone's behalf.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301563

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
